brand.name: HARA the label
brand.ethicalInfo1: HARA the label is a clothing label designed for you and our earth collectively.
brand.ethicalInfo2:
HARA the label's environment rating is 'good'. It uses low impact non-toxic dyes in all of its products. There is no evidence it minimises textile waste. It manufactures locally to reduce its carbon footprint. It reduces its wastewater by using a closed-loop system.

Its labour rating is 'it's a start'. Its final stage of production is undertaken in Australia, a low risk country for labour rights. It traces most of its supply chain. It is unclear whether it ensures payment of a living wage in its supply chain. There is no evidence it audits its supply chain.

This brand makes products that are generally free of animal materials so it is not applicable to rate its impact on animals. We calculate the overall rating from environment and labour scores only.

HARA the label is rated 'Good' overall.
brand.positiveText: Dear HARA the label, I love the style and features of your products, and also that you care about people, the planet and animals. Good On You!
brand.negativeText: Dear HARA the label, I love the style and features of your products, but I'm concerned about the impact of your brand on workers, the environment and animals. Until you do better I'll be looking for alternative brands that meet my needs.
